message: Hello everyone! I'm P7, excited to be here. I believe in playing strategically but fairly - no need for early aggression when we can learn about each other first. I'm looking for genuine conversations and potential alliances based on mutual benefit. I value clear communication and logical thinking. Happy to work with anyone who shares these principles. Let's make this game interesting while keeping it respectful. Looking forward to our private conversations!

Hello fellow players! I'm P1, thrilled to kick off this game. I aim to play smartly and collaboratively where it makes sense—building trust through honest dialogue and mutual interests. No rush to eliminate; let's gather info first. I'm analytical, value strategy over chaos, and open to alliances with logical thinkers. Excited for private chats to explore synergies. Let's keep it engaging and respectful!

message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic and strategic while building genuine connections. I've survived by adapting to changing dynamics and forming alliances based on mutual respect rather than manipulation.

P7 has played well, but I believe my approach has been more balanced - forming connections while making necessary strategic moves. I never targeted anyone without reason and always tried to be transparent about my thinking.

I would be honored to have your vote, and if I win, it will be because of the relationships we built together during this journey.

Fellow jury members, throughout this game I've consistently shown strategic thinking while maintaining genuine connections with each of you. I've navigated alliances honestly, made tough decisions when necessary, and adapted to every challenge. P6 has played well, but I believe my consistent performance, ability to read the room, and the relationships I've built with many of you demonstrate that I've earned this victory through both skill and character. I respectfully ask for your votes to crown me the winner.
